Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Rosecrest Street, east of the Evenborough Park.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the Evenborough Park is located to the west. The park is formed around four small paths leading into the park from each direction, and then forming two concentric circles in the center of the park. On the east side of the road, you can see the shoreline of the Lyanden Lake.
